loc-1764180850906.name: The Shadowed Keep
loc-1764180850906.description: A crumbling fortress once ruled by the dark elves of the Shattered Realms. Overgrown with twisted vines and haunted by the echoes of ancient sorcery, it stands as a testament to forgotten power.

features.name: The Well of Shadows
features.description: A deep, dark well that pulses with an eerie light. Rumored to be a source of drow magic and power.

features.name: The Vault of Cursed Artifacts
features.description: An ancient vault hidden within the fortress walls, containing relics tainted by dark elven sorcery.

quests.title: Seeking the Well of Shadows
quests.description: The Shadowed Keep holds a deep, dark well that pulses with an eerie light. Legends whisper it is a source of ancient drow magic and power. Investigate its secrets to uncover what lies within.

objectives.description: Locate the Well of Shadows in The Shadowed Keep
Determine if the well holds any magical energy or artifacts

currentScene.name: Whispers from the Well
currentScene.description:
As you stand before the crumbling walls of the Shadowed Keep, your heart pounds with both fear and curiosity. The fortress is in ruins, its towers leaning like the bones of a dying civilization. Overgrown vines cling to ancient stones, and the air feels heavy with an unnatural chill.

A faint glow emanates from one of the broken archways, drawing you closer. Inside, you find an old journal half-buried beneath piles of dust, its pages filled with cryptic notes about a dark ritual that once took place hereâ€”a ceremony meant to bind the realms together but instead tore them asunder.

Suddenly, a chilling wind sweeps through the keep, and the shadows seem to move on their own. An eerie melody echoes from somewhere within the depths of the fortress, a haunting tune that fills you with both dread and an inexplicable yearning to uncover its source.
